# type

**Instance Property**

The UTI type of the attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The system derives the value of this property from the attachment data.

## Getting the Attachment Contents

- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the attachment.
- **url**: The URL of the file for this attachment.
